Uses of Interface
ptolemy.vergil.toolbox.TextEditorFactory

  • Packages that use TextEditorFactory 
    Package Description
    ptolemy.actor.gui.syntax
    A syntax-directed editor.
    ptolemy.vergil.toolbox
    Vergil factories.

    • Uses of TextEditorFactory in ptolemy.actor.gui.syntax

      Constructors in ptolemy.actor.gui.syntax with parameters of type TextEditorFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      SyntaxTextEditorForStringAttributes(TextEditorFactory factory, Attribute attributeToEdit, int rows, int columns, java.lang.String title, javax.swing.text.Document document)
      Create a annotation text editor for the specified attribute.

    • Uses of TextEditorFactory in ptolemy.vergil.toolbox

      Classes in ptolemy.vergil.toolbox that implement TextEditorFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TextEditorConfigureFactory
      If this class is contained by a actor, then double clicking on that actor will invoke a text editor that edits the value of a specified string attribute.
      class  TextEditorTableauFactory
      This class is an attribute that creates a text editor to edit a specified string attribute in the container of this attribute.
